name: Skythian Gold (The Goddess Api)
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to an artefact of the Skythian culture - a lamina applique`s work of 6th century B.C. with the depiction of the Goddess Api, the Scythians` original mother.
averseDescription: On the coin obverse within a bead circle there is depicted the small National Emblem of Ukraine, above which there is 2008, the coin mintage year; between the bead circle and the coin rim there are the inscriptions: НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) (above), 2 ГРИВНІ (2 Hryvnia) (below), as well as Au 999,9 , the designation of the metal (on the left), 1,24, its mass and the NBU Mint logotype (on the right).
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a depiction of a golden lamina applique` work as the Goddess Api with serpent-like legs and there is also a semicircular inscription: СКІФСЬКЕ ЗОЛОТО (Skythian Gold) (beneath).
